name: Guero
description:
Guero is a game where you search for treasures in a haunted cave.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 40 Compo by Alberto "_beta" Mellado.

-----------------------

Written in C# on Unity.

Tools:

Unity

Adobe Photoshop

Audacity

-----------------------

Directions:

Movement -> A / Left Arrow  - D /Right Arrow

Left Mouse Click -> Hook (Hold to stay)

Right Mouse Click -> Release Treasure

------------------------

If you do not know what to do:

Bring the trasures to the top by touching them.

------------------------

Contact:

albertomelladoc@gmail.com

-----------------------

This was my 7th Ludum Dare entry and I am quite happy with the result. I think the gameplay is quite awesome. I really enjoy the gamefeel :D.

Hope you enjoy it.

-----------------------
